sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>village</radical> <radical>beforehand</radical> (what the village was before it was a village) was a <kanji>field</kanji>.
meaningInfo: It makes sense for a big open field to have been what was there before the village was made.
readingMnemonic: On this <kanji>field</kanji>, the <reading>Ya</reading>nkees (<ja>や</ja>) used to play.
readingInfo: It was sad that they had to destroy the natural habitat of the Yankees (a field) to put up the village.
